title: How to Make Coffee Cheesecake

steps.headline: Cut the biscuits up until they are very fine.
Melt the butter in a saucepan.
Add the butter and stir it and the biscuits in a bowl.
Press the crumbs up a bowl of about 22 centimeter (8.7 in).
Mix the cream cheese and sugar until the mixture is very smooth.
Beat in the butter and Kahlua.
Pour it onto the biscuit mixture.
Put it in a slightly warm place.
Fold the coffee essence through the mixture.

text: Cut the biscuits up until they are very fine. Do so using a processor. Melt the butter in a saucepan.  Add the butter and stir it and the biscuits in a bowl.  Press the crumbs up a bowl of about 22 centimeter (8.7 in). Do so with a fork. Mix the cream cheese and sugar until the mixture is very smooth.  Beat in the butter and Kahlua.  Beat in the sour cream.  Pour it onto the biscuit mixture.  Put it in a slightly warm place.  Fold the coffee essence through the mixture. Place in the fridge overnight. Finished.
